title: 6.14 patch, pressing launch fails to bring up login screen.
body:
ive been having an issue where i would press the launch button after the update and the screen would disappear. no black screen or anything on a task manager.
here's what i have done to try and fix it and have had no luck.
deleted files including RADS, projects, clientlist, 
i've ran as admin, disabled my firewall, ran while internet explorer was up.
i've deleted and re downloaded this game and still no luck
anything that could help would be very appreciated.

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher could be corrupt and failing to launch the login screen.  Check out our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide which will provide some steps in addition to what you've tried so far.  Please let me know if you're still having issues afterwards.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) I know you've already done some of these steps, proceed to the ones you didn't perform. 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
